title: plat jungler LF ranked duo partner
body:
currently plat 5 and look for a duo partner to rank up with.
Must have a working mic and discord
Prefer a decent size champion pool
any role but prefer a top or mid laner

add optimistic if interested

replies.body:
ay, I'd be interested in playing with you, I'm currently gold 3, just finished my placements but my highest rank was diamond 3 last season.

I took a couple months off, I main mid though :>

cutelittleri#7545 is my discord if you're interested
